name: Smash! Mobile
tag_list: windows-system-administrators, mobile, applications, android, apple, mobile-business
overview:
Our business-focused mobile platforms streamline work for Windows System Administrators, making remote management of critical account tasks as easy as possible. As the thought and technology leader in Windows tools for the mobile platform, Smash! applications streamline work for Windows System Administrators. We enable system admins to easily and efficiently handle account administration tasks from mobile devices, including Smartphones and tablets. Smash! presents powerful, necessary network tools for a mobile world.

Smash! is comprised of a group of savvy IT professionals well-versed in the needs of Windows System Administrators. Industry veterans, our team leverages decades of experience in software development to create smart mobile tools for managing Windows Servers. The capabilities, experiences and relationships weâ€™ve developed over years give Smash! the hands-on expertise and knowledge capital necessary to achieve a leadership advantage in the mobile business tool development market.
